column4: hi :) I have 3 ubuntu computers here at home and I've come up with an idea to sync my dad's profiles on all the machines so no matter which one he chooses to use, he'll have the same desktop and files and settings
I think rsync is the way to go
if they're networked, wouldn't using a network share for the home directory be easier ?
but then one of the computers'd have to be on all the time
